item.title: Roadmap
item.description: The current framework is working and there are several examples can be found at https://github.com/networknt/light-example-4j/tree/master/graphql There are several things in mind to improved it. Add fine-grained authorization Write an example with database as data source. Write an example with in-memory data grid as data source. Example of accessing other services.
